ComicInfo.Title: Earth Invasion; Chairman Mao and the Men From Mars; There's No Business Like Space Business; Fast Food; Saucer Attack; Surviving Son; Pick of the Litter; Watcher from the Skies; U.F.O. Indoors; Outpost
ComicInfo.Summary: Parody of Kal El(Superman) being saved from Krypton.
